title: why
body: why do i have to play and not behing good at plases all the time am not a pro i play league for fun so why do i have always to get flame on and get shit from others players and i report and you guys do nothing i have enaught if you owner of league of legends dont do change you will lose alot of players cuz those players flame flame for 30min cuz your not a pro hello league its for fun i will love to see you guys get flame for 30min -45min whit out saying a single word do sommething about it au shut the game down

replies.body: Mute other players, then you wont hear flame. That's the only reasonable advice besides try to get a little better.

/mute all
your problem solved.
if you don't want to listen, just mute them.
otherwise its your own problem you are affected by flaming.
